title: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class
description: Bug 49235 - ServletContainerInitializer onStartup(Set<Class<? classSet is not expected class. The output is 'MySomeClass', but I expected the output to be 'MySomeAnn'. This issue is not yet implemented in the Servlet 3.0 specification. My code works fine on Glassfish 3.0.
EB: I expect the output to be 'MySomeAnn'.
